authorisedkeysmc.error.no-keys-left:
Could not authenticate with any of the keys!
Contact a server admin for more help.
authorisedkeysmc.error.server-auth-fail: The server could not prove its identity! (incorrect signature)
authorisedkeysmc.screen.registration.pro:
Would you like to register your "%1$s" key with the server?

Key "%1$s": %2$s

Once you register, you can only join as this player if you possess the same public key.

If you do not register, this player UUID will remain open for anyone to log in as.
authorisedkeysmc.screen.unknown-server-k:
The authenticity of the server %1$s can't be established.

It has the key: %2$s

Most likely, this happened because you are joining this server for the first time.

Do you wish to continue connecting?
This key will be remembered for future log-ins.
authorisedkeysmc.screen.wrong-server-key:
The public key of the server %1$s has changed!

Old key: %2$s
New key: %3$s

This could either mean:

    a.) Man-in-the-middle attack.
    b.) An admin simply changed out the key.
    c.) A mistake on an admin's part.

If you continue, the new key will be kept.
Do you wish to continue connecting?
authorisedkeysmc.status.waiting-for-chal: Waiting for signature challenge from the server...
